menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with lemon butter sauce.Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with lemon butter sauce.

menu.name: Beef Steak
menu.description: Juicy ribeye steak served with roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes.Juicy ribeye steak served with roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

menu.name: Pasta Carbonara
menu.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

menu.name: Chicken Alfredo
menu.description: Fettuccine pasta tossed with creamy Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken.Fettuccine pasta tossed with creamy Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Traditional pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.Traditional pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

menu.name: Sushi Platter
menu.description: Assorted fresh sushi rolls including salmon, tuna, and avocado.

menu.name: Cheeseburger
menu.description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and fries.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone.

menu.name: Fruit Salad
menu.description: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits served with honey and mint.

films.title: Film 1
films.description: A skilled thief who steals secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance to erase his past crimes by planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

news.title: New Menu Launch
news.description: We are excited to announce our new seasonal menu featuring fresh ingredients and exciting flavors. Come and taste the difference!

news.title: Film Festival Winner
news.description: Our latest production has won the Best Picture award at the International Film Festival. A huge thank you to our cast and crew!

news.title: Special Event: Jazz Night
news.description: Join us this Friday for a night of smooth jazz and delicious cocktails. Live performance by the Blue Note Trio.

news.title: Charity Gala Success
news.description: Thanks to your generous support, we raised over $10,000 for local charities at our annual gala dinner.
